pkgmetadata.longdescription: Sequence Globally Unique Identifier (SEGUID) Checksums // Implementation of the original Sequence Globally Unique Identifier (SEGUID) algorithm [Babnigg and Giometti (2006) doi:10.1002/pmic.200600032] and SEGUID v2 (https://www.seguid.org), which extends SEGUID v1 with support for linear, circular, single- and double-stranded biological sequences, e.g. DNA, RNA, and proteins.
